# Install CLI clients

Available through Python’s PyPI or distribution packages (yum/apt) ## Install main OpenStack client via pip: `# pip install python-openstackclient` via yum: `# yum install python-openstackclient` via apt: `# apt install python-openstackclient`

## Get project credentials

You can download credential file from dashboard: ![api-access](./api-access.png)

`clouds.yaml` - for good for multi-cloud/multi-project scenarios, if you are using multiple cloud OS_CLOUD variable needs to be set `RC files v2/v3` - v3 recommended

## Use help - alawys ``` $ openstack help $ openstack help server Command “server” matches:

server add fixed ip server add floating ip server add port server add security group server add volume server backup create server create server delete server dump create server event list server event show … $ openstack help server create
usage: openstack server create [-h] [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}]
[-c COLUMN] [–max-width <integer>] [–fit-width] [–print-empty] [–noindent] [–prefix PREFIX]
